channel.title: Clovis on C-MOOR
channel.description: Recent content in Clovis on C-MOOR

item.title: Clovis BIOL11A Lab Fall 2019
item.description: PreLab Introduction to R This will open a web tutorial teaching the basics of R. Lab Exercise Instructions For each lab, download the file and open it using RStudio, then click the “Run Document” button in the top left panel. You may need to right-click the link and choose “Download File”. Make sure you save it as a .Rmd file - some browsers like to save it as a text file by adding .

item.title: Clovis BIOL11A Lab Spring 2019
item.description: PreLab Introduction to R This will open a web tutorial teaching the basics of R. Day 1 Lab Day 1 Lab Download this file and open it using RStudio. You may need to right-click the link and choose “Download File”. Make sure you save it as a .Rmd file - some browsers like to save it as a text file by adding .txt to the end of the file name.

item.title: Clovis BIOL11A Lab Fall 2018
item.description: Instructions: Download a zip file containing all the tutorials and related assets. Unzip this file. If you have not already, you will need to install R, RStudio, and the R packages listed in the README file. There are 3 R Markdown (.Rmd) files in the main folder - these are the tutorials. Open them using RStudio and click “Run Tutorial”. PreLab Introduction to R: Clovis_Intro_R.Rmd Day 1 Lab Introduction to RNA-seq: Clovis_RNAseq_single_sample.
